name: Budget Cut Bullet Hell
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission.

Budget Cut Bullet Hell is a split focus game about flying a spacecraft built for two all by yourself (money has been tight, after all).

Fight waves of enemies in a classic SHMUP with one hand, and repair your damaged ship with the other.  Be careful, each time you get hit, one of your ships functions will break.  If you don't fix it fast, you could find yourself stranded in front of an enemy horde!

Replace broken circuits, toggle those switches!  Play Simon Says and drop in some more quarters!  Smack that panel that you're not really sure what it does, but when you hit it things start working again!

Best get to it!  I get paid by the word, and were almost out of...
